articles.title: An American tragedy: US COVID death toll tops 700,000 - ABC News
articles.content: The United States reached another grim milestone on Friday, as the confirmed coronavirus death toll topped 700,000, just over a year and a half into the pandemic, and despite the wide availability of… [+6846 chars]

articles.title: Former Vancouver mayor Philip Owen dead at 88 - CBC.ca
articles.description: Philip Owen is perhaps best known for championing the “four pillars” drug strategy for Vancouver, which led to the city having North America’s first legal supervised injection site.
articles.content:
Philip Owen, who was mayor of Vancouver from 1993 to 2002, has died at the age of 88.
Owen was a councillor and park board commissioner before becoming mayor, and served for nine years, the third lo… [+2982 chars]

articles.title: Burna Boy drops “Want It All” featuring Polo G - P.M. News
articles.description: Grammy award-winner Damini Ogulu popularly known as Burna Boy releases a new single “Want Ot All” featuring American rapper Polo G.
articles.content:
Grammy award-winning Nigerian artiste, Damini Ogulu popularly known as Burna Boy has released a new single Want it All featuring American rapper Polo G.
